sections.heading: Subsidy agreement; duration; amount; periodic review; confidentiality8-144
sections.text: Subsidy agreement; duration; amount; periodic review; confidentialityA. The family entering into subsidized adoption and the department shall sign a subsidy agreement that contains a provision for periodic review as provided
